references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational latent diffusion model architecture, which is extensively used and analyzed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art text-to-image diffusion model that directly inspires the methods and analysis of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is the core text encoder used in the text-to-image models studied, and its properties heavily influence the target paper's analysis.

references.paper_title: Attend-and-excite: Attention-based semantic guidance for text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper addresses similar challenges related to object generation and image quality, making it highly relevant to the target paper's scope.

references.paper_title: Towards understanding cross and self-attention in stable diffusion for text-guided image editing
references.reason: This paper explores the role of attention mechanisms within diffusion models, aligning with the target paper's focus on causal relationships in text encoders.
